description: Identifying string linked to the individual or animal being studied, provided by the data contributor
Name of the cohort the individual belongs to
valid values: Other,Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

description: The taxonomic ranking including both species and subspecies the individual belongs to.
valid values: Human, Rodent, Bird, Mammal, Primate, Other, Unknown Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

description: The biological sex of the individual
valid values: Male, Female, Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

White, Black or African American, Asian, American Indian or Alaska Native, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander, Multiracial, Other race, Prefer not to answer, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified
ontology: Sage Bionetworks, AMA Manual of Style, 11th edition, NCI Thesaurus

valid values: Not Hispanic or Latino,Hispanic or Latino,Prefer not to answer, Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

description: A coded value specifying the self-declared ethnic origination independent of racial origination, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
note: A data contributor should be able to write in a name OR provide one of these values: Unknown Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

description: Age of the individual (age in years of the individual at first recorded study event (enrollment, visit, observation, sample collection, survey completion, etc.)
note: A data contributor should be able to write in a name OR provide one of these values: Unknown Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

description: Whether the individual has been diagnosed with a condition or disease (physical and/or cognitive), \True" indicates the individual has been diagnosed"
valid values: True, False, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified

note: HPO, MONDO, MAXO codes or labels (not listed for purposes of this RFC), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable, Not specified
